com.complexible.common.io

Class Files2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.io.Files2

  • public final class Files2
extends Object

    Collection of utility functions for file-centric operations.

    Since:
    1.0

      • createDirectory

        public static File createDirectory(File theDirectory)
                            throws IOException
        Create a valid directory from the given File
        Parameters:
        theDirectory - the directory to create
        Returns:
        the newly created directory
        Throws:
        IOException - if the directory cannot be created

      • deleteRecursively

        public static void deleteRecursively(File theFile)
                              throws IOException

        Recursively deletes a directory and all its contents, if this a file, it will simply be deleted.

        Be careful calling this, if any directory is a symlink, this could delete the contents of the linked directory.

        Parameters:
        theFile - the file or directory to recursively delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error while deleting

      • listFiles

        public static List<File> listFiles(File theDirectory)
        Recursively traverse the directory and all its sub directories and return a list of all the files contained within.
        Parameters:
        theDirectory - the start directory
        Returns:
        all files in the start directory and all its sub directories.

      • zipDirectory

        public static void zipDirectory(File theDir,
                                File theOutputFile)
                         throws IOException
        Zip the given directory.
        Parameters:
        theDir - the directory to zip
        theOutputFile - the zip file to write to
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there is an error while zipping the directory or while saving the results.

      • listFiles

        public static List<File> listFiles(File theDirectory,
                                   FileFilter theFilter)
        Recursively traverse the directory and all its sub directories and return a list of all the files contained within. Only files which match the file filter will be returned.
        Parameters:
        theDirectory - the start directory
        theFilter - the file filter to use.
        Returns:
        the list of files in the directory (and its sub directories) which match the file filter.

      • rotate

        public static void rotate(File theFile)
                   throws IOException
        Rotates a file. Moves the specified file to a new file in the same directory, the name of the new file is postfixed with the current date (YYYY-mm-dd). If this file exists, that file name is post-fixed .<num> where number is continuously incremented counter until a unique file name is found.
        Parameters:
        theFile - the file name to be rotated
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file could not be moved to the new location

      • copyDirectory

        public static void copyDirectory(File theSource,
                                 File theDest)
                          throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deleteFiles

        public static boolean deleteFiles(File theFile)
